titles: The truth of our times revealed out of one mans experience, by way of essay. Written by Henry Peacham.
author: Peacham, Henry, 1576?-1643?
publisher: Printed by N[icholas] O[kes] for Iames Becket, and are to be sold at his shoppe at the middle Temple gate,
notes: Running title reads: Experience of these times.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
